bug.author: eedeleon
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Failure due to a version bump in the transformers library <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
When running with transformer==2.2.0 and above the repo runs into a failure. ImportError: cannot import name 'WarmupLinearSchedule' from 'transformers' (/mnt/c/Users/eddeleon/home/miniconda3/envs/interpret_text/lib/python3.7/site-packages/transformers/init.py) <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Using transformers==2.1.1 worked. <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
